name: @kentico/kontent-model-generator
description: This utility generates strongly-typed models based on Content Types in a Kentico Kontent project. The models are supposed to be used together with the Kentico Kontent Typescript SDK.
author: richard sustek

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run ts-lint:check && npm run build:all
scripts.test:all: npm run build:all && npm run test:generate-models
scripts.test:generate-models: npm run build:commonjs && cd test && node ../_commonjs/src/app --projectId=da5abe9f-fdad-4168-97cd-b3464be2ccb9 --moduleResolution=ES2015 --codeType=typescript --strictPropertyInitalization=true --addTimestamp=true
